languages.text: "Также, увы, на собрании отсутствуют заслуживающие упоминания Мастер дисциплины и преподобный Адальберт. Почтенный Адальберт, Корабельный исповедник, проводит погребальные службы над погибшими офицерами, коих, увы, слишком много, чтобы он смог отлучиться из часовни. А госпожа Иокаста, заместившая на посту Мастера дисциплины своего погибшего предшественника, руководит дознанием, выискивая возможных уцелевших агентов Войгтвира на борту".

"It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."
languages.original_text: "Также, увы, на собрании отсутствуют заслуживающие упоминания Мастер дисциплины и преподобный Адальберт. Почтенный Адальберт, Корабельный исповедник, проводит погребальные службы над погибшими офицерами, коих, увы, слишком много, чтобы он смог отлучиться из часовни. А госпожа Иокаста, заместившая на посту Мастера дисциплины своего погибшего предшественника, руководит дознанием, выискивая возможных уцелевших агентов Войгтвира на борту".

traits.locale_text: "It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not come to the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Reverend Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert, ship's confessor, must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for the reverend to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently helming the search for any agents of Voigtvir who might have survived."

"It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not come to the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Reverend Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert, ship's confessor, must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for the reverend to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently helming the search for any agents of Voigtvir who might have survived."

"It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Reverend Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert, the ship's confessor, must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for the him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

"It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Reverend Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert, the ship's confessor, must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for the him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

"It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

"It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

languages.text: "Es ist überdies bedauerlich, dass zwei weitere erwähnenswerte Individuen nicht an unserem Treffen teilnehmen konnten: die Waffenmeisterin und Konfessor Adalbert. Der ehrwürdige Adalbert muss sich um die Bestattung der gefallenen Offiziere kümmern und kann die Kapelle angesichts der hohen Zahl von Opfern nicht verlassen. Und Meisterin Sauerback, die ihren verstorbenen Vorgänger als Waffenmeisterin ersetzt, leitet derzeit die Suche nach überlebenden Agenten von Voigtvir."
languages.original_text: "It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist überdies bedauerlich, dass zwei weitere erwähnenswerte Individuen nicht an unserem Treffen teilnehmen konnten: die Waffenmeisterin und Reverend Adalbert. Der ehrwürdige Adalbert, der Konfessor des Schiffs, muss sich um die Bestattung der gefallenen Offiziere kümmern und kann die Kapelle angesichts der hohen Zahl von Opfern nicht verlassen. Und Herrin Sauerback, die ihren verstorbenen Vorgänger als Waffenmeisterin ersetzt, leitet derzeit die Suche nach überlebenden Agenten von Voigtvir."

languages.text: « Il est tout aussi regrettable que deux autres figures clés n'aient pas pu se joindre à nous pour la réunion, j'ai nommé la capitaine d'armes et l'éminent confesseur Adalbert. Ce dernier doit superviser les offices funèbres organisés à la mémoire des défunts officiers, qui sont hélas trop nombreux pour qu'il puisse se permettre de quitter la chapelle. Quant à maîtresse Sauerback, qui a remplacé feu son prédécesseur en tant que capitaine d'armes, elle se charge actuellement de coordonner la traque des éventuels agents de Voigtvir qui auraient survécu. »
languages.original_text: "It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

traits.locale_text: « Il est tout aussi regrettable que deux autres figures clés n'aient pas pu se joindre à nous pour la réunion, j'ai nommé la capitaine d'armes et l'éminent révérend Adalbert. En sa qualité de confesseur du vaisseau, ce dernier doit superviser les offices funèbres organisés à la mémoire des défunts officiers, qui sont hélas trop nombreux pour qu'il puisse se permettre de quitter la chapelle. Quant à maîtresse Sauerback, qui a remplacé feu son prédécesseur en tant que capitaine d'armes, elle se charge actuellement de coordonner la traque des éventuels agents de Voigtvir qui auraient survécu. »

languages.text: «Del mismo modo, es lamentable que dos oficiales más a los que cabría mencionar no hayan podido acompañarnos en estos momentos: la maestra de armas y el confesor Adalbert. El insigne Adalbert debe ocuparse de los funerales por los oficiales caídos, que son demasiados como para que se ausente de la capilla. Mientras tanto, la maestra Sauerback ha sucedido a su difunto predecesor en el cargo y está liderando la búsqueda de cualquier agente de Voigtvir que pueda quedar».
languages.original_text: "It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

traits.locale_text: «Del mismo modo, es lamentable que dos oficiales más a los que cabría mencionar no hayan podido acompañarnos en estos momentos: la maestra de armas y el reverendo Adalbert. El insigne Adalbert, confesor de la nave, debe ocuparse de los funerales por los oficiales caídos, que son demasiados como para que se ausente de la capilla. Mientras tanto, la maestra Sauerback ha sucedido a su difunto predecesor en el cargo y está liderando la búsqueda de cualquier agente de Voigtvir que pueda quedar».

languages.text: 「同様に惜しまれるのは、マスター・アット・アームと聴罪師アダルバートという注目に値する人物がもう二人いたのですが、お二人がブリーフィングに参加できなかったことです。ご高名なアダルバートは、戦死した士官たちの葬儀を執り行わなければならず、その数があまりにも多すぎるため、礼拝堂から離れることができません。そしてザウアーバック様は亡き前任者に代わり、我らのマスター・アット・アームとして、現在ボイドヴィルを生き延びた諜報員の捜索指揮を執られています」
languages.original_text: "It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

traits.locale_text: 「同様に惜しまれるのは、マスター・アット・アームとアダルバート司祭という注目に値する人物がもう二人いたのですが、お二人がブリーフィングに参加できなかったことです。この船の聴罪師としてご高名なアダルバートは、戦死した士官たちの葬儀を執り行わなければならず、その数があまりにも多すぎるため、礼拝堂から離れることができません。そしてザウアーバック様は亡き前任者に代わり、我らのマスター・アット・アームとして、現在ボイドヴィルを生き延びた諜報員の捜索指揮を執られています」

languages.text: “同样令人遗憾的是，另外两位重要人员未能参加这场简报会，这两个人是告解神父阿达伯特与戒律大师。尊敬的阿达伯特是这艘船上的告解神父，他必须为阵亡的军官举行葬礼。由于死难人数太多，他无暇离开礼拜堂。而苏尔贝克女士已经接替了不幸遇难的戒律大师的衣钵，成为了新任戒律大师。目前，她正在负责搜查维特威尔的残党。”
languages.original_text: "It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."

traits.locale_text: “同样令人遗憾的是，另外两位重要人员未能参加这场简报会，这两个人是阿达伯特牧师与戒律大师。尊敬的阿达伯特牧师是这艘船上的告解神父，他必须为阵亡的军官举行葬礼。由于死难人数太多，他无暇离开礼拜堂。而苏尔贝克女士已经接替了不幸遇难的戒律大师的衣钵，成为了新任戒律大师。目前，她正在负责搜查维特威尔的残党。”

languages.text: "Silahtar ve Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert gibi pek kıymetli iki kişinin daha bilgilendirmede bize katılamaması aynı şekilde üzücü. Saygın Adalbert, vefat eden subaylar için düzenlenen cenaze törenleriyle ilgilenmek zorunda. O kadar çok subay hayatını kaybetti ki şapelden ayrılması mümkün değil. Bir önceki Silahtarımızın yerine geçen Sauerback Hanım'a gelirsek kendisi, Voigtvir'in hayatta kalan ajanlarını arama sürecini yönetiyor."
languages.original_text: "It is equally regrettable that two more individuals worthy of mention could not join us at the briefing: the Master-at-Arms and Confessor Adalbert. The eminent Adalbert must see to the funeral services being held for the fallen officers, of whom there are too many for him to take leave from the chapel. And Mistress Sauerback, who has replaced her late predecessor as our Master-at-Arms, is currently leading the search for any surviving agents of Voigtvir."
